TITLE: Content Development
DEF: Planning, structuring, compiling, and updating of educational content
TASK: The Content development pattern describes the task of planning, structuring, compiling, and updating educational content to meet defined learning objectives. A range of resources come into play, including generative AI systems, for information gathering, structuring and generation. To be effective, content needs to align well with the objectives, be engaging, interface with meaningful activities and valid assessment, maintain its relevance over time, and be well structured for optimal learner understanding and engagement.
